channel.title: Interstate Recognition of Notarization Act – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: It’s Back! H.R. 3808 Interstate Recognition of Notarization Act of 2010
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: It’s Back! H.R. 3808 Interstate Recognition of Notarization Act of 2010…simply a watch and see item after the pocket veto by Pres. Obama, to be voted on today for confirming or overturning the veto, noted by 4closureFraud. Update: Voting in the House was pretty much by party…results are here.
item.content:encoded:
It’s Back! H.R. 3808 Interstate Recognition of Notarization Act of 2010…simply a watch and see item after the pocket veto by Pres. Obama, to be voted on today for confirming or overturning the veto, noted by 4closureFraud.

Update: Voting in the House was pretty much by party…results are here.
